title: The Happy Pear
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Irish
description: Whole food store, fruit and vegetable shop, smoothie bar, and veggie cafe all in one. The shop area sells both organic and non-organic produce while the cafe offers usually 2 soups, 2 main courses such as curry or stew, plus salads, pita bread, and cakes. Free Wi-Fi.
